formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = (q^(e+1)-1)/(q-1) where q = (nextPrime(p)+1)/2. - _David W. Wilson_, Sep 01 2001; corrected by _Michel Marcus_, Feb 26 2015
maple: f:= proc(n) local q,r,t;  r:= 1;  for t in ifactors(n)[2] do    q:= (nextprime(t[1])+1)/2;    r:= r*(q^(t[2]+1)-1)/(q-1);  od:  rend proc:seq(f(n),n=1..100); # _Robert Israel_, Feb 26 2015
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, q = (nextprime(f[i, 1] + 1)+1)/2; f[i, 1] = (q^(f[i,2]+1) - 1)/(q-1); f[i, 2] = 1); factorback(f);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 26 2015
author: _Marc LeBrun_
extensions: Corrected and extended by _David W. Wilson_, Aug 29 2001
